txt.en: A message should be sent to the Orcs: they are not welcome to settle in Fangorn.
A message should be sent to the Orcs: they are not welcome to settle in Fangorn.
Orc-tents can be found in the White Hand encampment at the north-east edge of Fangorn.\n\nYou should burn many tents so that the Orcs do not get too comfortable settling in at their cruel encampment.
